text:
Under operating NT4 I'm using JDK1.3 to start the Tomcat 3.2.1, using the java 
Mail1.2 to send a message in a JSPPage, by sending Message with static Methode 
of Java Mail Transport.send(mymessage) I get the Exception: 
java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError.
After I change the JVM to JDK1.2 and restart the Tomcat3.2.1, the statement 
Transport.send(mymessage) will send a message successfully.
creator: bliu@advance-bank.de
marc.saegesser@apropos.com
text: How is this a Tomcat problem?
